typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{In Reference To} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_ts} as integer,
		accountID as string[],
		accountType as string[],
		accountingPrinciple as string,
		additionalField1 as string[],
		additionalField2 as string[],
		additionalField3 as string[],
		additionalField4 as string[],
		additionalField5 as string[],
		assignmentNbr as string[],
		baseAmount as string[],
		budgetLine as string[],
		businessTransaction as string[],
		centralBuyingRegion as string,
		company as string[],
		conceptCode as string[],
		costAmount as string[],
		costCenter as string[],
		country as string,
		currency as string,
		department as string[],
		determineTaxBase as string[],
		docDate as string,
		docHeaderText as string,
		docInfo as string[],
		docReferenceNumber as string,
		exchangeRate as string,
		id as string,
		ingestLinkID as string,
		internalOrder as string[],
		item as string[],
		jurisdiction as string[],
		legacyPO as string[],
		postingDate as string,
		profitCenter as string[],
		quantityAmount as string[],
		quantityUOM as string[],
		referenceNbr as string[],
		retailAmount as string[],
		reversalDate as string,
		reversalReason as string,
		sourceId as string,
		taxtype as string[],
		tradingPartner as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT * FROM c WHERE (GetCurrentTimestamp()-(c._ts*1000))/1000 < 3600',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false,
	batchSize: 0,
	throughput: 1000) ~> cosmossource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document') ~> rules
cosmossource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document') ~> sink1
